function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Trips to and from 'red' areas with confirmed COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 infections","Mitigation":"Blocking all trips to and from 'red' areas, 14-day home quarantine","Technologies":"Not specified","People":"Employees, travelers","Owner":"Employers, travel authorities"},{"Description":"Selective control and measurement of body temperature","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 from infected individuals","Mitigation":"Regular temperature checks for suppliers and external collaborators","Technologies":"Thermometers, temperature scanning devices","People":"Suppliers, external collaborators","Owner":"Employers, organizers"},{"Description":"High number of operators within confined environments","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in confined spaces","Mitigation":"Reduction of the number of operators in confined environments","Technologies":"Space management systems, scheduling software","People":"Employees, operators in confined environments","Owner":"Employers, facility managers"}]}
